climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Plug-and-Play Connection: Connect in 3 seconds (1) to your computer via a strong, reliable USB receiver that plugs into your computer’s USB port.
Comfortable and Mobile: Comfortable, mobile mouse shape is small enough to toss in a bag and the ambidextrous design guides either hand into a natural position
Power-Saving Features: 12-month battery life and auto sleep help you go longer between AA battery changes
Reliable 2.4 GHz Wireless Mouse: Reliable, the long-range computer mouse works up to 33 ft /10 m away from your computer
Easy Navigation: Thanks to controlled line-by-line scrolling and optical tracking, M170 Logitech Mouse has smooth and accurate cursor control on almost any surface
Compatibility: Experience seamless compatibility with Windows, macOS, Linux, Chrome OS, ipadOS, and Android operating systems
Plastic parts in M170 include certified post consumer recycled plastic (minimum 59% for Black, Blue/Black, Red/Black, Black/Grey, Grey/Black, Off-white and 38% for Rose and Blue gray (4))
Note: In the case of a wireless mouse, the USB receiver will be provided inside or along with the mouse
Certified carbon neutral; product carbon footprint: 4.05 kg CO2e
body.description: Logitech Wireless Mouse M170 Choose a reliable wireless connection now with the Logitech M170 Wireless Mouse. This affordable, no-hassle computer mouse has a 12-month battery life (2) and works with Windows, macOS, Linux, Chrome OS, ipadOS, and Android operating systems. Main Features: Pointing Device Connectivity Technology: Wireless Pointing Device Wireless Technology: Radio Frequency Movement Detection: Optical Number of Total Buttons: 2 Scroller Type: Scroll Wheel Ergonomic Mouse Fit: Symmetrical Pointing Device Host Interface: USB Height: 1.4" (35.2 mm) Width: 2.4" (61.5 mm) Depth: 3.8" (97.7 mm) Weight with Battery (Approximate): 2.49 oz (79.5 g) Device Supported: Computer Environmentally Friendly: Yes Wireless Range: 10 meters (3) (1) Tested by Logitech with 50 persons in Switzerland (2022) (2) Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions (3) Actual wireless range may vary based on use, settings, and environmental conditions (4) Excludes receiver and printed wiring assembly (PWA) plastics, and packaging (5) Based on independent sales data (in units) aggregated for Logitech mice and keyboards from major global markets including Canada, China, France, Germany, Indonesia, Republic of Korea, Russian Federation, Sweden, TW, Turkey, UK, US (Jun'21-May'22 period). Retail channel only. (6) Logitech Ergonomic Lab study on 23 participants in (Oct / 2019) with two Logitech standard mice and two standard, embedded trackpads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WIRELESS SIMPLICITY M170 is ready when you are. Simply plug the receiver into a USB port on your device to start working in seconds. The small size and smooth cursor control make it great for tight workspaces and busy desks. Enjoy the world of wireless!
ANY HAND, ANYWHERE The compact, wireless M170 has a fully ambidextrous design that easily fits within your laptop bag, so you can get to work anywhere—whether you’re left- or right-handed.

PLUG & PLAY WIRELESS Connect in 3 seconds get up to 10 meters* of wireless freedom with a strong, reliable USB receiver. No delays, No dropouts. M170 is compatible with Windows, macOS, Chrome OS and Linux. *Actual wireless range may vary based on use, settings, and environmental conditions

BATTERY LIFE YOU CAN COUNT ON Durable and reliable, M170 also works up to 12 months without changing batteries thanks to the on/off switch button and auto-sleep power-saving mode. *Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions.

QUALITY YOU CAN RELY ON Built with the same high quality standards that have made Logitech the global leader for mice and keyboards. *Based on independent sales data (in units) aggregated for Logitech mice and keyboards from major global markets including (Jun'21-May'22 period). Retail channel only.

BETTER THAN A TOUCHPAD Using a mouse is more ergonomic than a touchpad*. The compact shape and wireless capability lets you work comfortably —at home, the office, or anywhere in between. *Logitech Ergonomic Lab study on 23 participants in (Oct / 2019) with two Logitech standard mice and two standard, embedded trackpads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and works well!
reviews.reviewText: This is not a quiet mouse, if you like the sound of the mouse clicking, I recommend purchasing this. The mouse is mini and easily portable. It is the perfect size for traveling and on the go. You can connect it by USB or Bluetooth. The mouse is responsive and so far, no complaints yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech M170 Wireless Mouse - The Perfect Companion for Smooth and Effortless Navigation!
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech M170 Wireless Mouse has been a reliable and indispensable addition to my computer setup. This wireless mouse offers seamless connectivity with its 2.4 GHz USB mini receiver, eliminating the need for tangled cords and providing the freedom to move around without limitations. The optical tracking technology ensures smooth and precise cursor control, making it effortless to navigate through documents, websites, and applications.What sets this wireless mouse apart is its ergonomic design and comfortable grip. The compact and symmetrical shape fits perfectly in both my left and right hand, reducing hand fatigue during extended use. The responsive and tactile buttons provide a satisfying click, enhancing my productivity and overall user experience. The Logitech M170 Wireless Mouse is a plug-and-play device, and setting it up took only seconds, without any complicated installations. Whether I'm using it with my PC, Mac, or laptop, this mouse performs flawlessly, and its long-lasting battery life ensures it stays reliable and ready whenever I need it. If you're in need of a reliable and user-friendly wireless mouse for your computing needs, the Logitech M170 is an excellent choice that delivers smooth navigation and comfort in one sleek package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little mouse
reviews.reviewText: Has worked easy with no problems, well made and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: it’s a good mouse that works well and is a comfortable size. my only critique is that the battery life only lasted 4 months (I always make sure to turn it off when not in use)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me - Small in the hand.
reviews.reviewText: I've used a lot of mice over the years, at home, and in a career as a graphic designer. I've tried trackballs and weird mice, and I always come back to just a regular mouse. I have big hands but I prefer a small mouse with two buttons and a scroll wheel, and this Logitech Wireless Mouse M170 fits the bill, in fact I'm using it to replace a Logitech Wireless Mouse that has been serving me for years. The scroll wheel had stopped working. I have a lot of confidence in Logitech products, and expect this one to serve me for years, and I spend several hours on my computer every day. The excellent price point and promise of long battery life is real a bonus.

reviews.reviewerName: yep this is ittttyep this is itttt
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars go ahead and get yourself this mouse asap!
reviews.reviewText: its such a good mouse i love it. small and portable. i use it for my school chromebook and for my at home laptop im so happy with this purchase! i see a lot of people saying they don't know how to connect it and stuff like that but guys ITS NOT BLUEBOOTH. its wireless and comes with a smaller usb plug thingy. its inside the mouse where the battery is and you pull it out lol! i saw reviews where they made a video saying it didnt work but the usb was inside the mouse and they missed it! sad for them..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little pink mouse
reviews.reviewText: I don't like using the pad on my laptop so I ordered this wireless mouse. I like the way it slants so my hand sits comfortably on it. The clickers work well and the scroll works as it should. The pink color is so cute! The bottom slides off for battery installation and a storage place for the receiver that you plug into the laptop so it won't get lost when not in use. Works perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like Logitech mouses (mice?). Unfortunately this is the 5th or 6th one I am using. Every year or two, cordless mouses suddenly stop working and I have to get a new one. Corded ones last forever. So no idea what happens. Until then, this mouse, like other Logitech mouses, gives excellent service. It is compact, comfortable to use and has range of quite a few feet. If the computer is being used some distance away, and I move the mouse at a distance of about 10 feet, the mouse still causes the cursor to move. A bit disconcerting until you realize what is happening.Never had to replace a battery before it stops working. I initially thought a new battery was needed but that was not the case.
cara! muito bom, vale cada centavo. ergonomico e rapido
I so love the color of this mouse. It works great and easy to install. Just plug in the included USB and that's it. The size is the right size for my hand. Comfortable to use.
El color está bonito, todo es de plástico duro, es ligero, funciona bien y trae pila incluida. Buena relación precio/calidad, lo compré con descuento en $139. Llegó bien empacado y en tiempo.
Logitech best in, good product and safe package 📦, thanks Logitech, buys this product
